trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Washington
There were no other sightings in Washington on or around February 7th 2008
Summary: blinking object turned into 2 red lights and separated
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside smoking and saw a red light the size of a pin head shoot off in the blink of an eye. In it's place appeared a blinking stobe light the size of about 3 pin heads. The Stobe then split into 2 red lights and separated about 3 fingers wide then disappeared. It all took place to the south west. I reported other sightings about a week ago.
